verses.verse: מַשָּׂ֖א <WH4853> The burden גֵּ֣יא <WH1516> of the valley חִזָּי֑וֹן <WH2384> of vision מַה־ <WH4100> What לָּ֣ךְ אֵפ֔וֹא <WH645> What aileth thee now כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for עָלִ֥ית <WH5927> that thou art wholly gone up כֻּלָּ֖ךְ <WH3605> you have all לַגַּגּֽוֹת׃ <WH1406> roof

תְּשֻׁא֣וֹת ׀ <WH8663> of stirs מְלֵאָ֗ה <WH4395> fruit עִ֚יר <WH5892> city הֽוֹמִיָּ֔ה <WH1993> a tumultuous קִרְיָ֖ה <WH7151> city עַלִּיזָ֑ה <WH5947> a joyous חֲלָלַ֙יִךְ֙ <WH2491> thy slain לֹ֣א <WH3808> Nor חַלְלֵי־ <WH2491> [men are] not slain חֶ֔רֶב <WH2719> with the sword וְלֹ֖א <WH3808> Nor מֵתֵ֥י <WH4191> nor dead מִלְחָמָֽה׃ <WH4421> in battle

כָּל־ <WH3605> All קְצִינַ֥יִךְ <WH7101> All thy rulers נָֽדְדוּ־ <WH5074> are fled יַ֖חַד <WH3162> together מִקֶּ֣שֶׁת <WH7198> by the archers אֻסָּ֑רוּ <WH631> they are bound כָּל־ <WH3605> All נִמְצָאַ֙יִךְ֙ <WH4672> all that are found אֻסְּר֣וּ <WH631> in thee are bound יַחְדָּ֔ו <WH3162> together מֵרָח֖וֹק <WH7350> from far בָּרָֽחוּ׃ <WH1272> [which] have fled

עַל־ <WH5921> concerning כֵּ֥ן <WH3651> after that אָמַ֛רְתִּי <WH559> Therefore said שְׁע֥וּ <WH8159> I Look away מִנִּ֖י <WH4480> away אֲמָרֵ֣ר <WH4843> bitterly בַּבֶּ֑כִי <WH1065> from me I will weep אַל־ <WH408> not תָּאִ֣יצוּ <WH213> labour לְנַֽחֲמֵ֔נִי <WH5162> not to comfort עַל־ <WH5921> concerning שֹׁ֖ד <WH7701> me because of the spoiling בַּת־ <WH1323> of the daughter עַמִּֽי׃ <WH5971> of my people

כִּ֣י <WH3588> has a יוֹם֩ <WH3117> For [it is] a day מְהוּמָ֨ה <WH4103> of trouble וּמְבוּסָ֜ה <WH4001> and of treading down וּמְבוּכָ֗ה <WH3998> and of perplexity לַֽאדֹנָ֧י <WH136> by the Lord יְהוִ֛ה <WH3069> GOD צְבָא֖וֹת <WH6635> of hosts בְּגֵ֣יא <WH1516> in the valley חִזָּי֑וֹן <WH2384> of vision מְקַרְקַ֥ר <WH6979> breaking קִ֖ר <WH7023> down the walls וְשׁ֥וֹעַ <WH7771> and of crying אֶל־ <WH413> to הָהָֽר׃ <WH2022> to the mountains

וְעֵילָם֙ <WH5867> And Elam נָשָׂ֣א <WH5375> bare אַשְׁפָּ֔ה <WH827> the quiver בְּרֶ֥כֶב <WH7393> with chariots אָדָ֖ם <WH120> of men פָּֽרָשִׁ֑ים <WH6571> [and] horsemen וְקִ֥יר <WH7024> and Kir עֵרָ֖ה <WH6168> uncovered מָגֵֽן׃ <WH4043> the shield

וַיְהִ֥י <WH1961> Then מִבְחַר־ <WH4005> And it shall come to pass [that] thy choicest עֲמָקַ֖יִךְ <WH6010> valleys מָ֣לְאוּ <WH4390> shall be full רָ֑כֶב <WH7393> of chariots וְהַפָּ֣רָשִׁ֔ים <WH6571> and the horsemen שֹׁ֖ת <WH7896> shall set שָׁ֥תוּ <WH7896> themselves in array הַשָּֽׁעְרָה׃ <WH8179> at the gate

וַיְגַ֕ל <WH1540> And he discovered אֵ֖ת <WH853> מָסַ֣ךְ <WH4539> the covering יְהוּדָ֑ה <WH3063> of Judah וַתַּבֵּט֙ <WH5027> and thou didst look בַּיּ֣וֹם <WH3117> in that day הַה֔וּא <WH1931> he אֶל־ <WH413> on נֶ֖שֶׁק <WH5402> to the armour בֵּ֥ית <WH1004> of the house הַיָּֽעַר׃ <WH3293> of the forest

וְאֵ֨ת <WH853> בְּקִיעֵ֧י <WH1233> also the breaches עִיר־ <WH5892> of the city דָּוִ֛ד <WH1732> of David רְאִיתֶ֖ם <WH7200> Ye have seen כִּי־ <WH3588> for רָ֑בּוּ <WH7235> abundance וַֽתְּקַבְּצ֔וּ <WH6908> and ye gathered together אֶת־ <WH853> מֵ֥י <WH4325> the waters הַבְּרֵכָ֖ה <WH1295> pool הַתַּחְתּוֹנָֽה׃ <WH8481> of the lower

וְאֶת־ <WH853> בָּתֵּ֥י <WH1004> the houses יְרוּשָׁלִַ֖ם <WH3389> of Jerusalem סְפַרְתֶּ֑ם <WH5608> And ye have numbered וַתִּתְֿצוּ֙ <WH5422> have ye broken down הַבָּ֣תִּ֔ים <WH1004> and the houses לְבַצֵּ֖ר <WH1219> to fortify הַחוֹמָֽה׃ <WH2346> the wall

וּמִקְוָ֣ה ׀ <WH4724> also a ditch עֲשִׂיתֶ֗ם <WH6213> Ye made בֵּ֚ין <WH996> between הַחֹ֣מֹתַ֔יִם <WH2346> between the two walls לְמֵ֖י <WH4325> for the water הַבְּרֵכָ֣ה <WH1295> pool הַיְשָׁנָ֑ה <WH3465> of the old וְלֹ֤א <WH3808> Nor הִבַּטְתֶּם֙ <WH5027> but ye have not looked אֶל־ <WH413> on עֹשֶׂ֔יהָ <WH6213> unto the maker וְיֹצְרָ֥הּ <WH3335> unto him that fashioned מֵֽרָח֖וֹק <WH7350> it long ago לֹ֥א <WH3808> Nor רְאִיתֶֽם׃ <WH7200> thereof neither had respect

וַיִּקְרָ֗א <WH7121> call אֲדֹנָ֧י <WH136> did the Lord יְהוִ֛ה <WH3069> GOD צְבָא֖וֹת <WH6635> of hosts בַּיּ֣וֹם <WH3117> And in that day הַה֑וּא <WH1931> he לִבְכִי֙ <WH1065> to weeping וּלְמִסְפֵּ֔ד <WH4553> and to mourning וּלְקָרְחָ֖ה <WH7144> and to baldness וְלַחֲגֹ֥ר <WH2296> and to girding שָֽׂק׃ <WH8242> with sackcloth

וְהִנֵּ֣ה ׀ <WH2009> behold שָׂשׂ֣וֹן <WH8342> And behold joy וְשִׂמְחָ֗ה <WH8057> and gladness הָרֹ֤ג ׀ <WH2026> slaying בָּקָר֙ <WH1241> oxen וְשָׁחֹ֣ט <WH7819> and killing צֹ֔אן <WH6629> sheep אָכֹ֥ל <WH398> eating בָּשָׂ֖ר <WH1320> flesh וְשָׁת֣וֹת <WH8354> and drinking יָ֑יִן <WH3196> wine אָכ֣וֹל <WH398> let us eat וְשָׁת֔וֹ <WH8354> and drink כִּ֥י <WH3588> for מָחָ֖ר <WH4279> for to morrow נָמֽוּת׃ <WH4191> we shall die

וְנִגְלָ֥ה <WH1540> And it was revealed בְאָזְנָ֖י <WH241> in mine ears יְהוָ֣ה <WH3069> GOD צְבָא֑וֹת <WH6635> of hosts אִם־ <WH518> Surely יְ֠כֻפַּר <WH3722> shall not be purged הֶעָוֹ֨ן <WH5771> Surely this iniquity הַזֶּ֤ה <WH2088> this לָכֶם֙ עַד־ <WH5704> Until תְּמֻת֔וּן <WH4191> from you till ye die אָמַ֛ר <WH559> saith אֲדֹנָ֥י <WH136> the Lord יְהוִ֖ה <WH3068> by the LORD צְבָאֽוֹת׃ <WH6635> of hosts פ

כֹּ֥ה <WH3541> Thus אָמַ֛ר <WH559> Thus saith אֲדֹנָ֥י <WH136> the Lord יְהוִ֖ה <WH3069> GOD צְבָא֑וֹת <WH6635> of hosts לֶךְ־ <WH1980> Come בֹּא֙ <WH935> get אֶל־ <WH413> about הַסֹּכֵ֣ן <WH5532> thee unto this treasurer הַזֶּ֔ה <WH2088> to this עַל־ <WH5921> charge שֶׁבְנָ֖א <WH7644> [even] unto Shebna אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> who עַל־ <WH5921> charge הַבָּֽיִת׃ <WH1004> which [is] over the house

מַה־ <WH4100> What לְּךָ֥ פֹה֙ <WH6311> here וּמִ֣י <WH4310> and whom לְךָ֣ פֹ֔ה <WH6311> have here כִּֽי־ <WH3588> that חָצַ֧בְתָּ <WH2672> What hast thou here? and whom hast thou here that thou hast hewed thee out לְּךָ֛ פֹּ֖ה <WH6311> here קָ֑בֶר <WH6913> a sepulchre חֹצְבִ֤י <WH2672> [as] he that heweth him out מָרוֹם֙ <WH4791> on high קִבְר֔וֹ <WH6913> a sepulchre חֹקְקִ֥י <WH2710> [and] that graveth בַסֶּ֖לַע <WH5553> rock מִשְׁכָּ֥ן <WH4908> an habitation לֽוֹ׃

הִנֵּ֤ה <WH2009> Behold יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> Behold the LORD מְטַלְטֶלְךָ֔ <WH2904> will carry thee away טַלְטֵלָ֖ה <WH2925> captivity גָּ֑בֶר <WH1397> with a mighty וְעֹטְךָ֖ <WH5844> and will surely עָטֹֽה׃ <WH5844> cover

צָנ֤וֹף <WH6801> He will surely יִצְנָפְךָ֙ <WH6801> violently turn צְנֵפָ֔ה <WH6802> and toss כַּדּ֕וּר <WH1754> thee [like] a ball אֶל־ <WH413> about אֶ֖רֶץ <WH776> country רַחֲבַ֣ת <WH7342> A vast יָדָ֑יִם <WH3027> able שָׁ֣מָּה <WH8033> There תָמ֗וּת <WH4191> there shalt thou die וְשָׁ֙מָּה֙ <WH8033> and there מַרְכְּב֣וֹת <WH4818> and there the chariots כְּבוֹדֶ֔ךָ <WH3519> of thy glory קְל֖וֹן <WH7036> [shall be] the shame בֵּ֥ית <WH1004> house אֲדֹנֶֽיךָ׃ <WH113> of thy lord's
וַהֲדַפְתִּ֖יךָ <WH1920> And I will drive מִמַּצָּבֶ֑ךָ <WH4673> thee from thy station וּמִמַּעֲמָֽדְךָ֖ <WH4612> and from thy state יֶהֶרְסֶֽךָ׃ <WH2040> shall he pull thee down

וְהָיָ֖ה <WH1961> will come בַּיּ֣וֹם <WH3117> And it shall come to pass in that day הַה֑וּא <WH1931> I וְקָרָ֣אתִי <WH7121> that I will call לְעַבְדִּ֔י <WH5650> my servant לְאֶלְיָקִ֖ים <WH471> Eliakim בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son חִלְקִיָּֽהוּ׃ <WH2518> of Hilkiah

וְהִלְבַּשְׁתִּ֣יו <WH3847> And I will clothe כֻּתָּנְתֶּ֗ךָ <WH3801> him with thy robe וְאַבְנֵֽטְךָ֙ <WH73> him with thy girdle אֲחַזְּקֶ֔נּוּ <WH2388> and strengthen וּמֶֽמְשֶׁלְתְּךָ֖ <WH4475> thy government אֶתֵּ֣ן <WH5414> and I will commit בְּיָד֑וֹ <WH3027> into his hand וְהָיָ֥ה <WH1961> will become לְאָ֛ב <WH1> and he shall be a father לְיוֹשֵׁ֥ב <WH3427> to the inhabitants יְרוּשָׁלִַ֖ם <WH3389> of Jerusalem וּלְבֵ֥ית <WH1004> and to the house יְהוּדָֽה׃ <WH3063> of Judah

וְנָתַתִּ֛י <WH5414> will I lay מַפְתֵּ֥חַ <WH4668> And the key בֵּית־ <WH1004> of the house דָּוִ֖ד <WH1732> of David עַל־ <WH5921> on שִׁכְמ֑וֹ <WH7926> upon his shoulder וּפָתַח֙ <WH6605> so he shall open וְאֵ֣ין <WH369> no סֹגֵ֔ר <WH5462> and none shall shut וְסָגַ֖ר <WH5462> and he shall shut וְאֵ֥ין <WH369> one פֹּתֵֽחַ׃ <WH6605> and none shall open

וּתְקַעְתִּ֥יו <WH8628> And I will fasten יָתֵ֖ד <WH3489> him [as] a nail בְּמָק֣וֹם <WH4725> place נֶאֱמָ֑ן <WH539> in a sure וְהָיָ֛ה <WH1961> will become לְכִסֵּ֥א <WH3678> throne כָב֖וֹד <WH3519> and he shall be for a glorious לְבֵ֥ית <WH1004> house אָבִֽיו׃ <WH1> to his father's

וְתָל֨וּ <WH8518> And they shall hang עָלָ֜יו <WH5921> on כֹּ֣ל ׀ <WH3605> all כְּב֣וֹד <WH3519> upon him all the glory בֵּית־ <WH1004> house אָבִ֗יו <WH1> of his father's הַצֶּֽאֱצָאִים֙ <WH6631> the offspring וְהַצְּפִע֔וֹת <WH6849> and the issue כֹּ֖ל <WH3605> all כְּלֵ֣י <WH3627> all vessels הַקָּטָ֑ן <WH6996> of small מִכְּלֵי֙ <WH3627> quantity from the vessels הָֽאַגָּנ֔וֹת <WH101> of cups וְעַ֖ד <WH5704> against כָּל־ <WH3605> to all כְּלֵ֥י <WH3627> even to all the vessels הַנְּבָלִֽים׃ <WH5035> of flagons

בַּיּ֣וֹם <WH3117> In that day הַה֗וּא <WH1931> he נְאֻם֙ <WH5002> saith יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> the LORD צְבָא֔וֹת <WH6635> of hosts תָּמוּשׁ֙ <WH4185> be removed הַיָּתֵ֔ד <WH3489> shall the nail הַתְּקוּעָ֖ה <WH8628> that is fastened בְּמָק֣וֹם <WH4725> place נֶאֱמָ֑ן <WH539> in the sure וְנִגְדְּעָ֣ה <WH1438> and be cut down וְנָפְלָ֗ה <WH5307> and fall וְנִכְרַת֙ <WH3772> that [was] upon it shall be cut off הַמַּשָּׂ֣א <WH4853> and the burden אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> after עָלֶ֔יהָ <WH5921> and כִּ֥י <WH3588> for יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> for the LORD דִּבֵּֽר׃ <WH1696> hath spoken ס
